problems.question: Which way is the bus heading?
problems.title: Bus

problems.question: What is unusual about the following words: revive, banana, grammar, voodoo, assess, potato, dresser, uneven?
problems.title: Word Play

problems.question: What makes this number unique -- 8,549,176,320?
problems.title: Game of Numbers
problems.answer: It contains each number, zero through nine, in alphabetical order.

problems.question: A palindrome is a word that reads the same when spelled backwards (eg rotavator). How could the following word be considered a palindrome? FOOTSTOOL
problems.title: A Palindrome
problems.answer: Footstool is a palindrome when written in Morse code.

problems.question: What are the next three numbers in this series? 4, 6, 12, 18, 30, 42, 60, 72, 102, 108, ?, ?, ?,
problems.title: Guess the Pattern
